title: Fix 11 test failures from merge integration
description: After merging 3 parallel builder branches, 11 tests fail due to API mismatches. Root causes: (1) id.test.ts passes arrays but generateId expects Set<string> — 7 failures, (2) tpl.test.ts expects different pour/status behavior — 3 failures, (3) init.test.ts expects idempotent init but impl rejects it — 1 failure. Fix either tests or implementations to be consistent. 100/111 tests pass.
closeReason: All implementations merged to main. 111 tests pass, lint clean, typecheck clean.
